sentence.Network_en: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
sentence.Network_cn: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。

sentence.Network_en: He conducted these instructional sessions with animation and humor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在这些会议上讲话诙谐生动.

sentence.Network_en: The bang menu title has virtually no instructional value ( except perhaps through shock value ).
sentence.Network_cn: 咣 当菜单标题实际上没有教学价值,它令人迷惑和不安.

entry.def: Instructional books or films are meant to teach people something or to offer them help with a particular problem.

example.ex: ...instructional material designed to help you with your lifestyle...
example.tran: 旨在帮助建立健康的生活方式的指导材料

example.ex: You may wish to take advantage of our instructional session.
example.tran: 你应该充分利用我们的教学课程。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or used in instruction;

auth_sentence.content: She also created a series of professionally-produced, instructional DVDs.
